translation.en: [man] In seeking his British nationalization, His Royal Highness
Prince Philip of Greece and of Denmark

translation.ko: 그 밖의 모든 해외 직위를 포기하며

translation.en: And, from henceforth, he will be known as Lieutenant Philip Mountbatten, Royal Navy.
translation.ko: 앞으로는 영국 해군의 필립 마운트배튼 대위로 불리게 될 것입니다

translation.en: I grant you and the heirs, male of your body,
translation.ko: 짐은 그대와 그대의 상속인, 즉 아들의

translation.en: lawfully begotten, the dignities of Baron Greenwich,
translation.ko: 법적 직계에 한하여 그리니치 남작 작위와

translation.en: Earl of Merioneth and Duke of Edinburgh.
translation.ko: 메리오네스 백작 에든버러 공작 작위를 수여한다

translation.en: of our Most Noble Order of the Garter.
They got through it. I got through it.
I think they'd have preferred a nice, pink-faced marquis
with a grouse moor in the Scottish Borders.
Are you sure you wouldn't have preferred one of those?
translation.ko: 당신도 그런 사람이 더 낫지 않겠어?

translation.en: Someone with a grand title, rather than a homeless Charlie Kraut?
translation.ko: 대단한 작위를 가진 사람 말이야 집도 없는 독일인보다는

translation.en: -Oh. -That would have all been very antiseptic.
Must you really smoke? You know how I hate it.
translation.ko: 담배를 꼭 피워야 해? 내가 싫어하는 거 알면서

translation.en: Pity. Because I love it so very much.
But, like a great many other things, I'm going to give it all up for you.
translation.ko: 하지만 당신을 위해 포기한 다른 많은 것처럼 이것도 포기할게

translation.en: Well, you still have 24 hours to change your mind.
translation.ko: 아직 24시간 동안은 마음 바꿀 수 있어

translation.en: You think I can change my mind after all that?
translation.ko: 이제 와서 내가 마음을 바꿀 것 같아?

translation.en: -I've signed myself away. -Or won the greatest prize on Earth.
translation.ko: 서명까지 했는걸 세상 가장 훌륭한 상을 받은 걸로 해

translation.en: A naval officer's stag night? Chance would be a fine thing.
translation.ko: 해군 장교 총각파티라 눈 붙일 생각은 말아야지

translation.en: Spot of blood in my spittle yesterday morning.
translation.ko: 어제 아침에 보니 침에 피가 섞여 나오더군

translation.en: -Ought I be concerned? -Well, I'm not a doctor, sir.
translation.ko: - 걱정하지 않아도 될까? - 제가 의사가 아니라서요, 폐하

translation.en: It's probably just the cold weather. Gets right to the back of the throat.
translation.ko: 날씨가 추워서 그럴 겁니다 곧바로 목구멍에 탈이 나죠

translation.en: Cold weather. That's what I thought.
The carriage will be cold too, Peter.
I've arranged for there to be hot water bottles, sir.
You're making bloody hard going out of this collar!
translation.ko: 옷깃 만지는 게 뭐가 그리 힘들어!

translation.en: -Sorry, sir. Nearly there. -You're doing it on purpose!
translation.ko: - 죄송합니다, 거의 됐습니다 - 일부러 그러는 거지

translation.en: Now, sir, we're not going to let something as small as a collar agitate us, are we?
translation.ko: 이런 사소한 일로 심기가 불편해지시면 안 되죠

translation.en: No, thank you, James. Sir, eyes front. Chin up.
translation.ko: 됐습니다, 제임스 폐하, 앞을 봐 주세요 고개 들어 주세요

translation.en: There was a young lady named Sally,
she sat on the lap of a well-endowed chap
translation.ko: 그녀는 튼튼한 남자의 무릎에 앉아 소리쳤죠

translation.en: and cried, "Sir! You're right up my alley!"
There was an old Countess of Bray,
translation.ko: 브레이 백작 부인이 나이가 좀 있었는데 말이야

translation.en: you may think it odd when I say
that despite her high station, rank and education...
translation.ko: 그녀의 높은 직위와 교육 수준에도 불구하고…

translation.en: ...she always spelled cunt with a K.
[man 2] It's a royal wedding, not a campaign trail.
But you have to admire him.
There's poor old Attlee. He's our prime minister.
Winston still thinks he's the father of the nation.
translation.ko: 윈스턴은 아직도 자신이 영국의 아버지라고 생각하는구먼

translation.en: This whole thing's Mountbatten's triumph. He engineered it all.
translation.ko: 마운트배튼의 승리로군 다 그의 계획대로 됐네

translation.en: The man who gave away India.
we are gathered together here in the sight of God,
and in the face of this congregation,
to join together this man and this woman
translation.ko: 한 남자와 한 여자의 성스러운 결혼을

translation.en: Who giveth this woman to be married to this man?
translation.ko: 어느 분께서 이 여인을 신랑에게 보내십니까?

translation.en: You know why his three sisters aren't here?
-They're all married to Nazis! -[whispers] Do shut up!
-for better, for worse... -...for better, for worse...
translation.ko: 기쁠 때나 슬플 때나 기쁠 때나 슬플 때나

translation.en: -for richer, for poorer... -...for richer, for poorer...
translation.ko: 부유할 때나 가난할 때나 부유할 때나 가난할 때나

translation.en: -in sickness and in health... -...in sickness and in health...
translation.ko: 아플 때나 건강할 때나 아플 때나 건강할 때나

translation.en: to love, to cherish, and to obey.
translation.ko: 서로 사랑하고 아끼며 순종할 것을 서약합니다
서로 사랑하고 아끼며 순종할 것을 서약합니다

translation.en: -till death us do part. -...till death us do part.
translation.ko: 죽음이 우리를 갈라놓는 날까지 죽음이 우리를 갈라놓는 날까지

translation.en: You have to hand it to her. It's quite a victory.
translation.ko: - 전하 - 솔직히 인정해야지 완전한 승리를 거뒀잖아

translation.en: There wasn't a single person supported the match.
translation.ko: 그 누구도 이 결혼을 지지하지 않았어

translation.en: Not a single ally at Court or in government.
Utterly divine. May we have the groom's family, please?
translation.ko: 환상적입니다, 신랑 측 가족분들 나와 주시겠습니까?

translation.en: She turned us all on our heads.
And barely opened her mouth in the process.
Well, in the past 48 hours, reality has sunk in.
translation.ko: 아무튼 지난 48시간 동안 저는 현실에 눈을 떴어요

translation.en: Would you look at the mother?
-Just out of a sanatorium, I heard. -And dressed as a nun.
translation.ko: - 막 요양원에서 나왔다고 해요 - 게다가 수녀 차림새구나

translation.en: -[photographer] Are we ready? One... -A Hun nun.
[photographer] To me, please. Are we ready?
Quite magnificent. Thank you, thank you.
[photographer] That's quite charming. Are we ready?
marriage is as happy as mine has been,
I don't want you to miss a single thing.
[crowd chanting] We want the king! We want the king!
Thank you so much for coming. Oh, good, you're here!
Right, come on, you two, inside. Can't start without you.
translation.ko: 어서 들어오세요 두 분 없이는 시작 못 해요

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, pray silence for Her Royal Highness, Princess Elizabeth.
translation.ko: 신사 숙녀 여러분! 엘리자베스 공주님을 위해 정숙해 주십시오

translation.en: As I'm sure you all know,
my dear husband will soon no longer be Lieutenant Mountbatten
translation.ko: 사랑하는 제 남편이 더는 마운트배튼 대위가 아니라

translation.en: Which, I gather, involves a whole new gold ring for me to sew onto your uniform!
Half a gold ring, darling. Half a gold ring, gentlemen.
translation.ko: 반 개면 돼, 여보 반 개면 됩니다, 여러분

translation.en: So I've asked the two most important people here to do the presentation.
translation.ko: 여기 귀빈 두 분께 수여식을 부탁드립니다

translation.en: There we are. Good boy, Charles, well done!
They're waiting in the green drawing room, ma'am.
Now, you wait with nanny and we'll be back in a minute.
-We came as soon as we could. -I know.
I'm happy to say the procedure went well,
and that His Majesty's immediate post-operative condition is satisfactory.
translation.ko: 현재 폐하의 수술 후 경과는 매우 좋습니다

translation.en: That's good news, isn't it? Yes. Are you all right?
[man on radio] ...after the votes are finally counted, Winston Churchill is Prime Minister
translation.ko: 투표 결과가 드디어 나왔습니다 윈스턴 처칠이 또다시

translation.en: of Great Britain and Northern Ireland once again.
translation.ko: 그레이트브리튼 및 북아일랜드 연합왕국 총리에 당선되었습니다

translation.en: After the Conservative Party achieved a narrow...
A little bacon won't hurt, surely, Gerald? It's been five weeks.
And make sure that egg is well-plated and no shell to risk irritation.
translation.ko: 달걀 껍질은 잘 제거해 괜히 실수해서 혼나지 말고

translation.en: And turn that noise off. He'll still be prime minister tomorrow.
translation.ko: 저 시끄러운 것 좀 끄게 어차피 내일도 처칠 경이 총리일 테니까

translation.en: Let's get him back on his feet.
We await the announcement of the new Cabinet in the coming days.
translation.ko: 이제 신 내각 구성원 발표만 기다리면 되겠습니다

translation.en: -Your first day back at work. -Who won?
Mr. Churchill, Your Majesty. By 17 seats.
Good for him! You didn't hear me say that.
translation.ko: 좋으시겠군 방금 내 말은 못 들은 거로 하게

translation.en: They keep trying to count him out,
but he keeps getting back up.
...and happy moment, to be elected for the second time,
What this nation needs is several years
translation.ko: 이 나라에 필요한 것은 장기적으로 강하고 안정적인
장기적으로 강하고 안정적인 풍부한 경험을 가진 정부입니다

translation.en: Congratulations, sir. Dr. Moran is here for you.
Yes, you just won a General Election, but...
Have a look at this for me, will you?
In the war, we used mathematicians to decode the indecipherable.
I need an expert to cut through the jargon.
Are they keeping something from me?
translation.ko: 그들이 나한테 뭘 숨기고 있는 건가?

translation.en: Well, I wouldn't be unduly concerned about the man's pneumatics.
translation.ko: 저라면 이분의 건강을 크게 신경 쓰지 않겠습니다만

translation.en: And, given his age, and he's a smoker.
translation.ko: 연세와 흡연자란 점을 고려해 볼 때

translation.en: Catarrhal inflammation, it's not that unusual.
But I would be concerned about the bronchoscopy.
translation.ko: 하지만 기관지 내시경을 한 건 걱정이 됩니다

translation.en: They wouldn't have done that unless they were looking for something far more serious.
translation.ko: 뭔가 더 심각한 질병을 찾으려고 시행했을 테니까요

translation.en: And they conspicuously fail to mention the results.
translation.ko: 그런데 진단 결과는 정확히 안 나왔네요

translation.en: Instead they go on about the lung resection.
translation.ko: 그 대신 폐 절제 얘기만 계속 나와요

translation.en: Which they performed because of "structural alterations".
It's what doctors say when they avoid using the word that it almost inevitably describes.
translation.ko: 의사들이 결정적인 표현을 피하고 싶을 때 쓰는 말이지요

translation.en: One doesn't want to overdo it. One doesn't want to look ill, either.
translation.ko: - 과하지 않게 했습니다 - 아파 보여도 안 되지

translation.en: king is no good to anyone.
-I just thought, a man of his age... -This one never sits. Get rid of it.
translation.ko: - 연세를 고려해... - 앉지를 않는 사람이니 치우게

translation.en: Your party has won the election,
I invite you to form a government in my name.
Would it be terribly unconstitutional of me to say how happy I am?
translation.ko: 내가 얼마나 기쁜지 얘기하면 엄청난 위헌이 되는 건가?
매주 우리 둘이 얘기 나눌 때가 그리웠어

translation.en: Your predecessor is a fine parliamentarian.
But, well, as company, as a companion...
An empty taxi pulled up at the House of Commons, and Mr. Attlee got out.
translation.ko: 빈 택시 하나가 하원 의사당 앞에 섰는데 애틀리 당수가 내리더랍니다

translation.en: [sighs] Now you may congratulate me in return.
I seem to have bounced back a lot quicker than people expected.
Not sure I ever imagined what breathing through one lung would feel like.
translation.ko: 폐 하나로 숨 쉬는 기분이 어떨지 상상도 못 했는데 말이야

translation.en: Turns out there's barely any difference. [chuckles]
Though... probably wise to let the Princess Elizabeth
-Is she up to it? -Yes, I'd say so.
Besides... we have to start breaking her in gently, don't we?
translation.ko: 게다가 그 아이도 공무에 나서야 할 때가 되지 않았나?

translation.en: Keep one eye on the future.
Everything exactly as it was before.
-Oh, Miss Venetia Scott, sir. -A new addition.
-A good one, I'd say. -Thank you, sir.
I had hoped I'd seen the back of this place.
Could you give us a moment, please, Jock?
translation.ko: 잠시 우리 둘만 있게 해주겠어, 쟉?

translation.en: He talked a great deal about his recovery. Lots of mentions of "bouncing back".
Which always makes one fear the worst. Not to mention the make-up.
translation.ko: 사람은 그럴 때 가장 불안하지 게다가 화장까지 하셨더라고

translation.en: See what they've been serving for the past five years.
translation.ko: 지난 5년 동안 어떤 음식을 내왔는지 봐야겠네

translation.en: That's what defines the condition of living.
translation.ko: 다만 죽지 않았기에 살아 있다고 하는 거지

translation.en: What about the day after tomorrow? And the day after that?
The country needs to be led by someone strong.
translation.ko: 이 나라는 강한 인물이 이끌어야 돼요

translation.en: -Well, I'm strong! -You are also tired, Winston.
translation.ko: 그래, 내가 강하잖아! 강하지만 지쳤죠, 윈스턴

translation.en: A situation like that would require enormous energy.
translation.ko: 그런 큰일에 대처하려면 엄청난 에너지가 필요하다고요

translation.en: And I won't lie to you.
I have considered resigning for Anthony's sake. For your sake.
translation.ko: 앤서니와 당신을 위해 사임할까 생각도 해봤는데

translation.en: But then I realized a situation like that would also require statesmanship.
translation.ko: 그런 일이 벌어지면 노련한 정치가가 필요하잖아

translation.en: The party needs me. The country needs me.
translation.ko: 정당이 나를 원해 국가가 날 부른다고

translation.en: [Philip] This is Clarence House dining room to Clarence House kitchen.
translation.ko: 여기는 클래런스 하우스 식당 주방 나오라

translation.en: -[Charles] Dining room to kitchen! -Yes. Dining room to kitchen!
translation.ko: - 식당이다, 주방 나오라 - 식당이다, 주방 나오라

translation.en: Right, check the circuits and up the amperage of the fuse wire.
Imagine. I'm checking curtain fabrics in an hour.
translation.ko: 부럽군, 난 한 시간 후에 커튼 확인해야 하는데 말이야

translation.en: [man] The queen has asked to see you.
Yes, we look forward to seeing the doctor then.
translation.ko: 네, 그러면 그때 의사 선생님을 뵙도록 하죠

translation.en: We do both so love living at Clarence House
translation.ko: 저희 둘 다 클래런스 하우스가 좋아요

translation.en: and he has all sorts of ideas about how to modernize it.
translation.ko: 현대식으로 어떻게 꾸밀지 남편이 구상도 다 해놨어요

translation.en: He really is rather ingenious like that, actually.

translation.ko: - 그래, 피터 - 왕비 전하 공주님들도 계셨군요

translation.en: I have to make a decision about Christmas.
Tell me, do you think the King will be well enough to go to Sandringham?
translation.ko: 왕께서 샌드링엄 별장에 가실 수 있겠는가?

translation.en: I do. As a matter of fact, I think it would do him good.
-So it's decided. -Will you be joining us, too?
translation.ko: - 그럼 결정 났구나 - 피터도 같이 가나요?

translation.en: Course not. Peter will be spending Christmas at home with his family.
translation.ko: 아니지, 피터도 자기 가족들과 크리스마스를 보내야지

translation.en: I was only thinking of papa.
Given the choice, you know he'd never let him out of his sight.
translation.ko: 아버지께서는 피터가 옆에 있길 원하실 거예요

translation.en: -He's quite devoted to you. -Then let me discuss it with Rosemary.
translation.ko: - 그이가 자네를 의지하시니까 - 로즈메리와 상의해 보겠습니다

translation.en: Oh, no. No, it's out of the question.
Why, mummy? Let Peter discuss it.
translation.ko: 왜요, 엄마? 상의해 볼 수는 있죠

translation.en: But, as a wife, I know what my answer would be.
I'd want my husband at home at Christmas with his children.
translation.ko: 나라면 남편이 집에서 아이들과 크리스마스를 보내길 원할 거야
뭘 말이야? 아니, 다 안 먹었어

translation.en: That look between the two of you.

translation.ko: 오, 마거릿 아무한테도 말하면 안 돼

translation.en: The papers all think I'm for Johnny Dalkeith or Billy Wallace.
translation.ko: 언론은 내가 조니 댈키스나 빌리 월리스와 결혼할 거라더라

translation.en: -Mummy and Papa, too, by the way. -They're just boys. Whereas Peter is...
translation.ko: - 엄마, 아빠도 그러시지 - 애송이들이잖아 - 반면에 피터는... - 피터가 매력적인 건 알아

translation.en: No, I quite see the attraction of Peter.
translation.ko: - 반면에 피터는... - 피터가 매력적인 건 알아

translation.en: You told me that, after the operation,
But you didn't tell me about this.
translation.ko: 하지만 이럴 거란 얘기는 없었지 않은가

translation.en: At the time of the operation, as you know, structural alterations were discovered.
translation.ko: 폐하도 아시겠지만 수술 중에 구조적 변형이 발견되었습니다

translation.en: Of course. The blockage in the lung.
It's time we gave that blockage a name, sir.
We removed the left lung, sir. But the right...
translation.ko: 왼쪽 폐를 제거했습니다, 폐하 하지만 오른쪽에도...

translation.en: has fewer, but still significant, blockages.
translation.ko: 왼쪽보다는 적지만 상당한 양의 종양이 있었습니다

translation.en: I argued that His Majesty should be told at the time.
translation.ko: 저는 처음부터 폐하께서도 아셔야 한다고 주장했습니다

translation.en: A patient has a right to know the full picture.
But I was overruled. The theory was that, if His Majesty felt he'd been cured,
translation.ko: 하지만 대다수가 반대했죠 폐하께서 다 나았다고 믿으시면

translation.en: he could throw himself into his work without undue stress and, and, and worry.
translation.ko: 쓸데없는 스트레스나 걱정 없이 일상으로 돌아가실 거라고요

translation.en: -Nor anyone else in my family? -No, sir.
My understanding is the surgeons did everything they could.
translation.ko: 제가 알기로 수술 과정에서 가능한 조치는 모두 취했습니다

translation.en: ♪ In the bleak midwinter, long ago ♪
Ma'am, His Majesty has requested you attend him in his study.
In case you're wondering, I haven't anything specific to say.
translation.ko: 왜 불렀나 궁금할 테지 할 말이 있어서 부른 건 아냐

translation.en: Just wanted to spend time with you.
translation.ko: 그저 너와 함께 시간을 보내고 싶었을 뿐이란다

translation.en: If there's anything you wanted to ask me, just fire away.
Not if you keep on top of them.
Everything they want me to know, they stick on top.
translation.ko: 내가 알았으면 하는 것들이지 그런 걸 제일 위에 올려놓고

translation.en: Everything they'd rather I didn't know,
translation.ko: 내가 알아야 하지만 몰랐으면 좋겠다 싶은 것들
가령 각료회의나 외무성 브리핑 같은 건

translation.en: they tuck away at the bottom.
Which is why... the first thing I do when no one is looking, is this.
translation.ko: 그래서 아무도 보지 않을 때 내가 가장 먼저 하는 게 바로 이거란다

translation.en: Will you take that? Thank you.
Don't you get sick of it all?
Which is why it's so important to have the right person by your side.
translation.ko: 그래서 네게 맞는 사람이 네 옆에 있어야 하지

translation.en: I've been very lucky in that regard with your mother.
translation.ko: 난 네 엄마를 곁에 둬서 정말 행운이었다

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid he's become something of a snagaholic.
translation.ko: 꼬투리 잡는 데 재미 붙인 것 같아요
- 무슨 재미? - 저희 집 리모델링 중이잖아요

translation.en: Well, you know we're renovating Clarence House to make it our permanent home?
translation.ko: - 무슨 재미? - 저희 집 리모델링 중이잖아요 앞으로 거기서 살려고요

translation.en: Well, ever since he started supervising the work,
he can't look at anything without seeing its faults.
"That switch is an inch too high. And that door handle's wrong."
translation.ko: 스위치가 너무 높다거나 문고리가 잘못 달아졌다고요

translation.en: "Well, don't be silly," I say. "A handle's a handle."
translation.ko: 전 '바보처럼 굴지 말라'고 했죠 문고리는 문고리일 뿐이잖아요

translation.en: I should make more of an effort with him.
-Would he like that? -Yes, I think he'd love it.
And then when your health's improved, we'll return to Malta
and he'll have his navy again, and all will be well.
translation.ko: 그이가 해군에 복귀하고 나면 다 괜찮아질 거예요

translation.en: But, in the meantime... I'm still not yet well enough to travel.
translation.ko: 근데 아직 내가 여행 갈 정도로 회복되진 못했단다

translation.en: Which brings me to the forthcoming Commonwealth tour.
translation.ko: 곧 있을 영연방 순회도 어렵겠지 싶다

translation.en: I was wondering if you would consider stepping into my shoes, so to speak.
translation.ko: 그래서 네가 나 대신에 가 줬으면 한단다

translation.en: My health is improving but I'm still not yet well enough.
translation.ko: 회복되고 있긴 하다만 아직 그 정도는 아니라서

translation.en: -Well, if you think we're up to it. -You'll be fine.
translation.ko: 아빠가 그래야 한다고 하시면요 너희는 잘해낼 거다

translation.en: Then on to New Zealand. Bermuda. And there's talk of starting in Kenya.
translation.ko: 그리고 뉴질랜드, 버뮤다 케냐에서부터 시작할 수도 있대

translation.en: Yes. But it would mean so much to papa that we do it.
-What am I supposed to do all that time? -Don't worry, we'll put you to work.
translation.ko: - 난 뭘 해야 하는 거지? - 걱정 마, 할 일은 충분해 - 찰스, 이리 오렴 - 난 해군 장교야

translation.en: My work is as a naval officer,
translation.ko: - 찰스, 이리 오렴 - 난 해군 장교야

translation.en: not grinning like a demented ape while you cut ribbons!
translation.ko: 행사 때 당신 옆에서 히죽거리는 원숭이가 아니라고

translation.en: -What about the children? -The children will be fine.
Oh! Without their parents for months on end?
translation.ko: 몇 달 동안 부모랑 떨어져 있는데도?

translation.en: -Daddy, can you come and play? -I won't be a moment, darling.
translation.ko: - 아빠, 와서 같이 놀아요 - 잠시만, 아가

translation.en: If you go and play with grandpapa, I'll be right over. Good boy.
translation.ko: 할아버지랑 놀고 있으면 곧 가마, 착하지

translation.en: [Queen Elizabeth] Come on, darling, Daddy's busy. Come and start again.
translation.ko: 이리 온, 아빠는 바쁘시단다 - 다시 하자 - 아빠가 곧 올 거랬어요

translation.en: -They're too young to notice. -Come on. Be quiet.
It would so help in papa's recovery.
translation.ko: 아빠가 회복하시는 데 많은 도움이 될 거야

translation.en: -[Charles] Daddy, can you play now? -[King George] Charles.
translation.ko: - 아빠, 이제 놀아 주실 거죠? - 찰스

translation.en: -[Philip] What are we playing? -[Charles] Granny's footsteps.
translation.ko: - 뭐 하고 놀까? - 할머니랑 술래잡기요 그래, 그러자꾸나 이번 놀이 끝나면 자야 한다

translation.en: [Philip] Come on then. Let's go. And then it's bedtime.
translation.ko: 그래, 그러자꾸나 이번 놀이 끝나면 자야 한다

translation.en: -What's the weather like today? -Rather misty at the moment, sir.
translation.ko: - 오늘 날씨는? - 안개가 약간 꼈습니다, 폐하

translation.en: Yes, I'm not sure that's the correct address for the King of England.
translation.ko: 그래, 자네 그 말이 영국 왕에게 쓸 표현은 아닌 것 같구먼
- 오리 사냥에 딱 좋은 아침이야 - 네?

translation.en: Oh, Teal. Below the withy there.
When I woke up this morning, I thought we'd go to Babingley Flat or Eleven Acres.
translation.ko: 처음엔 바빙글리 플랫이나 일레븐 에이커로 갈까 했지

translation.en: But, in the end, there's nowhere better than the Splash
with a bagful of cartridges to lift the spirits.
translation.ko: 거기에 탄약이 가득하면 사기가 더 올라가지 않겠나

translation.en: His Majesty's back to himself again.
Oh, he is, thank you. Like a young man again.
translation.ko: 그렇다네, 고맙구먼 총각 때로 돌아간 기분이로군

translation.en: We'll be all right. My son-in-law's a naval man.
We will. If I can handle a frigate.
You understand, the titles, the... dukedom.
translation.ko: 자네는 공작이란 작위가 무엇을 뜻하는지 알고 있을 거네

translation.en: She is the essence of your duty.
translation.ko: 공주야말로 자네 의무의 가장 중요한 부분이지

translation.en: Of course, you'll miss your career.
But doing this for her, doing this for me...
translation.ko: 그렇지만 공주를 위하는 일 곧 나를 위하는 일

translation.en: there may be no greater act of patriotism.
Let's go shoot some duck, shall we?
[King George] You're too kind. Thank you.
